thread.title: Lady Gaga Announces Joanne World Tour After Super Bowl Halftime Show!
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Announces Joanne World Tour After Super Bowl Halftime Show!

author: Just Jared
title: Lady Gaga Announces Joanne World Tour After Super Bowl Halftime Show!
text:
Lady Gaga is heading back on tour!
After totally slaying her performance during the Super Bowl Halftime Show , the 30-year-old took to Twitter to announce that she is hitting the toad for her Joanne World Tour .

CHECK OUT: Lady Gaga Super Bowl Halftime Show 2017 Video – Watch Now! 
Gaga took to Twitter to announce the tour with just a simple gif of herself promoting the tour.
This will be Gaga ‘s sixth tour, with her most recent tour being the 2015 Cheek to Cheek Tour with Tony Bennett .
Check back with us for more info on Gaga ‘s upcoming tour!
pic.twitter.com/1Azwl8RvRW 
— xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) February 6, 2017
